definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: She also didn’t seem to be enjoying herself much; her face was red and she was crying.
sentences.chinese: 她自己看起来也没那么享受，脸庞发红还流着泪。

sentences.english: The boss is delighted, he's been all over the works dishing out bonuses and handshakes.
sentences.chinese: 老板高兴了，他走遍全厂分发红包，与每个人握手。

sentences.english: The evening sky is red, long shot of laughter.
sentences.chinese: 黄昏天发红，渔翁笑声隆。

sentences.english: Reduce redness by using a green shades.
sentences.chinese: 用绿色打出阴影来掩盖皮肤发红。

sentences.english: Her delicate face flushed pink, her lips pouted softly, as if she were going to cry.
sentences.chinese: 她的脸激动的发红，轻轻地撅着嘴，仿佛要哭似的。

sentences.english: The child presented with generalised redness of the skin and itching all over his body.
sentences.chinese: 这个孩子表现为全身皮肤发红和瘙痒。

sentences.english: The phenomenon of red appear urethral mouth should distinguish between view.
sentences.chinese: 出现尿道口发红的现象应区分看待。

sentences.english: I never experienced blisters but I did have some red peeling skin that was pretty itchy.
sentences.chinese: 我从来没有经历过水泡但我的确有发红脱皮并且奇痒。

sentences.english: His angry, red face became white with fear.
sentences.chinese: 他那张本来气得发红的脸由于害怕而变得发白。

sentences.english: Also inspect the opening of the ear canal for discharge, swelling, or redness.
sentences.chinese: 还视察外耳道孔的排写物，肿胀，或发红。

sentences.english: Only in very rare cases it will cause redness on your skin.
sentences.chinese: 只有在极少情况下才会引起皮肤发红。

sentences.english: She began to flush with excitement.
sentences.chinese: 她由于激动脸开始发红。

sentences.english: Can also feel with hand touching the rope strip same thing, the skin blushes likely.
sentences.chinese: 用手触摸还能感觉到象索条一样的东西，皮肤发红。

sentences.english: She was pale; her eyes were red; the candle which she carried trembled in her hand.
sentences.chinese: 她面色苍白，眼睛发红，手里拿着蜡烛，颤个不停。

sentences.english: The first week I noticed my skin was less red and dry.
sentences.chinese: 第一周我发觉我的皮肤发红和干燥的情况改善了不少。

sentences.english: I have very fair skin and suffer from redness at the least little sign of stress.
sentences.chinese: 我非常公平和患有皮肤发红至少没有迹象显示压力。

definition: to turn pale/to lose color/to go white
very red/red through and through/to blush (deep red)
wisps of blood/visible veins/(of eyes) bloodshot
to be suffused with white/to be discolored/to blanch
